code: import{CHANGE_SEARCHFIELD,REQUEST_ROBOTS_PENDING,REQUEST_ROBOTS_SUCCESS,REQUEST_ROBOTS_FAILED}from'./constants';var initialStateSearch={searchField:''};export var searchRobots=function searchRobots(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialStateSearch;var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case CHANGE_SEARCHFIELD:return Object.assign({},state,{searchField:action.payload});default:return state;}};var initialStateRobots={robots:[],isPending:true};export var requestRobots=function requestRobots(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialStateRobots;var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case REQUEST_ROBOTS_PENDING:return Object.assign({},state,{isPending:true});case REQUEST_ROBOTS_SUCCESS:return Object.assign({},state,{robots:action.payload,isPending:false});case REQUEST_ROBOTS_FAILED:return Object.assign({},state,{error:action.payload});default:return state;}};
